description: Angiopoietin belongs to the VEGF protein family involved in postnatal and embryonic angiogenesis. Angiopoietin proteins regulate the growth, chemotactic activity and functional behavior of vascular endothelial cells, and participate in angiogenesis. They are a family of growth factors, the best-studied being angiopoietin 1 (Ang-1) and angiopoietin 2 (Ang-2).
name: Angiopoietin-2 (ANG-2) Antibodies and Antigens
